reviews.review: The best puzzle game out there, probably. Great humor too.

Why do TV shows even exist at this point, when games like this one surpass anything that networks can churn out? Some of the most hilariously scripted abuse you'll ever receive, alongside nervewracking and fun tests. Should be renamed 'Narcissistic Ex-Girlfriend Simulator 2' - brilliant.

Amazing game 11/10. Graphics look absolutely phenomenal for being a game made in 2011. Voice acting, songs, and sound effects are amazing too. Never got bored playing with all the different tests and areas I had to maneuver. Incredible experience.
Great story. Awesome puzzles. Worth it for the humor alone. 11/10

I've been playing this game far before I had a PC, I got this game on the Xbox 360 in about 2012 - 2014 it was given to my for my birthday by my late grandpa. This game is a perfect sequel to portal 1 and it even solves some problems I've had with portal 1, like how the physics would be a bit wonky when you tried to do multiple portal jumps. I give this game a 10/10 and should be played by everyone who can afford it.

Portale to świetna gra, którą trudno się znudzić. Czasem niektóre poziomy są trudne i doprowadzają do szału. Jednak warto być cierpliwym, bo gra, a zwłaszcza przechodzenie jej, sprawia wielką satysfakcję. W trybie jednoosobowym fabuła jest niesamowita i bardzo zabawna.

This is the reason I ever had an interest in games. I don't need to make a review when this game is such a legend, but I just wanted to put my thanks out there. 

Both Portal games live up to the hype. Even if you've watched full playthrough videos of both, know all the ins and outs of the game, it doesn't do it justice. If you're just starting out with a new interest in puzzlers, first person games, or even just games in general, there's few choices better than this. It is perfect.
Очередная неплохая головоломка от компании Valve. Если хотите немного поломать голову и немого экшена , то вам эта игра подойдет :)
Plenty of new mechanics and a different tone of comedy.

Це гра просто супер. Проходив разом з другом угарали як дибіли. Ігра пушка. купив за 33 грн і не пожалів цих грошей. Ігра вийшла в 2011 році, а графіка на високому рівні. Так що всім РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

[Verse 1]
Cara bella, cara mia bella! (Beautiful dear, my darling beauty!)
Mia bambina, oh ciel! (My little girl, oh heaven!)
Che la stima! Che la stima! (How I adore you! How I adore you!)
O cara mia, addio! (Oh my dear, farewell!)

[Verse 2]
La mia bambina cara, (My dear little girl,)
Perche non passi lontana? (Why not go a long way away?)
Si, lontana da Scienza! (Yes, far from Science!)
Cara, cara mia bambina, (Dear, my beloved little girl,)
Ah, mia bella! (Ah, my beautiful one!)

[Verse 3]
Ah, mia cara! Ah, mia cara! (Ah, my dear! Ah, my dear!)
Ah, mia bambina! (Ah, my little girl!)
Oh cara, cara mia! (Oh dear, my dear!)

*Instrumental Break*

[Repeat Verse 3]
Mia cara! Ah, mia cara! (My dear! Ah, my dear!)
Ah, mia bambina! (Ah, my little girl!)
Oh cara, cara mia! (Oh dear, my dear!)

Portal 2 is one of the greatest games of all time, not only is the game fucking hilarious, its also has genius level design that always keeps the player engaged. this game was the game to originally get me into PC gaming so it will always hold a very great place in my heart. 100/10
